LanguageData.UNAGIapaka.label: winter coat
LanguageData.UNAGIapaka.description: A warm jacket with a fluffy lining.\n\nIt has the same performance as a hoodie.
LanguageData.UNAGImohukepu.label: winter cape
LanguageData.UNAGImohukepu.description: A warm cape with fluffy trim.\n\nIt has the same performance as a hoodie.
LanguageData.UNAGIfazukin.label: fluffy hood
LanguageData.UNAGIfazukin.description: A hood with a fluffy lining to keep out the cold.
LanguageData.UNAGIsantabo.label: santa hat
LanguageData.UNAGIsantabo.description: A Santa hat to keep out the cold.
